Stop-loss strategy: Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the ROE and ROA indicators show a decline.
Stop-loss triggered when ROE < 5% or EPS < -0.50 NTD
Trailing Stop Loss with a 15% drop from current price
Stop loss at 15% below current price, or when EPS growth rate decreases by more than 20% from previous year.
